item.title: Two die in lightning strike in Raichur district
item.description:
<![CDATA[Two persons, including a woman, and three livestock died in different lightning incidents in Raichur district on Friday.
They were identified as 45-year-old Hanumanth Yadav of Marchatahal village and 50-year-old Mallamma of Udamgal-Khanapur village in Raichur taluk.
A case has been registered at Yaragora police station.
A cow and two buffaloes also died in Mattur village, in Mudgal police station limits.

item.title: Lightning kills two in Raichur, 35 sheep in Koppal
item.description: <![CDATA[Raichur/Koppal: A lightning strike on Friday evening resulted in the tragic deaths of two people in the villages of Udamagal and Marchathal in Raichur taluk.
